name: Creative Refresh
description:
Goal

Get the dumpster into the sunet. Don't hit the rocks or you might never be able to get rid of the dumpster! Terrain and Rocks placement is randomly generated every time you play!

Controls:

  • A/D or ArrowKeys - Move Left and Right
  • MouseWheel  - Camera zoom
  • R - Reset Game at any time

Suggestion - Play in FullScreen more for maximum immersion.

Attribution for Sound Effects:
